titles.title: A resolution commending the Association for Advanced Life Underwriting on its 50th anniversary.
A resolution commending the Association for Advanced Life Underwriting on its 50th anniversary.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that the Senate: (1) congratulates the Association for Advanced Life Underwriting upon its 50th anniversary; and (2) wishes the Association continued success during its next 50 years.
